thread.title: Schweiger Dermatology Group Completes Acquisition of DermOne Dermatology's New Jersey Offices

author: cnbc.com
title: Schweiger Dermatology Group Completes Acquisition of DermOne Dermatology's New Jersey Offices

locations.name: new jersey offices long island city

organizations.name: schweiger dermatology group completes acquisition of dermone dermatology

text:
LONG ISLAND CITY, N.Y., March 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Schweiger Dermatology Group (SDG) is pleased to announce that it has acquired nine New Jersey locations of DermOne Dermatology (DermOne). This transaction is the twenty-fifth dermatology practice acquisition by SDG, the Northeast's largest dermatology group practice. SDG is well known for its excellent patient care, outstanding providers, state-of-the-art offices, same day appointments, and extended hours.
"The addition of DermOne's New Jersey offices to our platform is perfectly aligned with our growth strategy to partner with the very best providers in the markets we serve," said Dr. Eric Schweiger, founder and CEO of Schweiger Dermatology Group. "In joining our practice, these providers will continue to focus on providing quality patient care, while the rest of our team provides the support required to grow and run a busy practice."
The DermOne New Jersey office locations that have been added to Schweiger Dermatology Group include: Forked River, Freehold, Howell, Manahawkin, Manchester Township, Mays Landing, Middletown, Northfield and Toms River.
About Schweiger Dermatology Group
Schweiger Dermatology Group is the premier provider of dermatology services in the Tri-State area and the fastest growing dermatology group in the Northeast. SDG recently appeared on the Inc. 5000 list of fastest growing companies in America for 2017 and the 2017 Crain's New York Fast 50. SDG is leading the dermatology field with the primary goal of delivering high-quality care from its team of top notch providers using the most advanced treatments. The company currently owns and operates over 40 locations throughout Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, The Bronx, Long Island, Westchester County, Rockland County, and New Jersey. Under the leadership of founder and Chief Executive Officer Dr. Eric Schweiger, SDG provides dermatology services to over 500,000 patients annually.
For more information about Schweiger Dermatology Group, visit www.schweigerderm.com or contact Melissa Schweiger Kleinman; msk@schweigerderm.com .
